amendment.description: Amendments sought to permit natural gas development in certain areas that are now under moratorium precluding such development.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc to insert "oil" after "offshore" on page 53, line 12, strike "and natural gas" on page 53, line 20 and to strike "and natural gas" on page 54, line 3.

action.text: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendments (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 262 (Roll no. 192).
